data.comment: 16117 spectators have come along to watch today.
The first-half is under way at AFAS Stadion - Alkmaar kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at AFAS Stadion - Alkmaar kick-off to start the match.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Den Haag.
Jordy Clasie (Alkmaar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alkmaar needs to be cautious. Den Haag have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Alkmaar in their own half.
Alkmaar have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Dennis Higler awards the away team a throw-in.
Alkmaar's Oussama Idrissi is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Alkmaar in the half of Den Haag.
Dennis Higler awards Den Haag a goal kick.
Throw-in for Alkmaar at AFAS Stadion.
An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Teun Koopmeiners gives Alkmaar a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Corner awarded to Alkmaar.
Can Alkmaar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Den Haag's half?
Free kick Den Haag.
Alkmaar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Alkmaar extend their lead to 2-0 through Owen Wijndal.
Oussama Idrissi instrumental with a fine assist.
Alkmaar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Alkmaar.
Den Haag are pushing forward but Omar Bogle's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Alkmaar goal kick.
Alkmaar drives forward and Calvin Stengs gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Alkmaar at AFAS Stadion.
Dennis Higler signals a throw-in for Alkmaar, close to Den Haag's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Alkmaar.
Free kick for Alkmaar in their own half.
Throw-in Den Haag.
Dennis Higler signals a Den Haag throw-in in Alkmaar's half.
Den Haag have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Den Haag have a dangerous throw-in.
Alkmaar to take a throw-in in Den Haag territory.
In Alkmaar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Alkmaar close to the penalty box.
Den Haag to take a throw-in in Alkmaar territory.
Oussama Idrissi for the home team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Den Haag.
Alkmaar have a goal kick.
Can Den Haag get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alkmaar's half?
Ball safe as Alkmaar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alkmaar have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Dennis Higler awards Den Haag a goal kick.
Dennis Higler signals a Den Haag throw-in in Alkmaar's half.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Den Haag in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alkmaar are coming forward and Calvin Stengs gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Den Haag goal kick.
Free kick for Den Haag in the half of Alkmaar.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Alkmaar.
The first-half has ended.
Den Haag have kicked-off the second half at AFAS Stadion.
Goal kick for Alkmaar at AFAS Stadion.
Den Haag's Crysencio Summerville misses with an attempt on goal.
Alkmaar have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Alkmaar in Alkmaar.
Alkmaar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Alkmaar in the half of Den Haag.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Alkmaar close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Alkmaar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Den Haag have a goal kick.
Free kick for Den Haag in their own half.
Corner awarded to Alkmaar.
Can Alkmaar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Den Haag's half?
Free kick for Alkmaar in the half of Den Haag.
Aaron Meijers (Den Haag) gets booked by Dennis Higler, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Fredrik Midtsjo of Alkmaar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Den Haag goal kick.
Dennis Higler signals a throw-in for Alkmaar, close to Den Haag's area.
Alkmaar have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
The home team replace Fredrik Midtsjo with Hakon Evjen.
Dennis Higler awards the away team a throw-in.
Tomas Necid is replacing Omar Bogle for Den Haag at AFAS Stadion.
Bilal Ould-Chikh is on a sub for Crysencio Summerville for Den Haag.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alkmaar's Oussama Idrissi has run offside.
Throw-in Den Haag.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Den Haag in their own half.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Alkmaar in their own half.
Alkmaar to take a throw-in in Den Haag territory.
Ferdy Druijf is replacing Myron Boadu for the home team.
Throw-in for Den Haag at AFAS Stadion.
Alan Pardew (Den Haag) is making a third substitution, with Mark Duffy replacing Aaron Meijers.
Free kick for Alkmaar in their own half.
Den Haag awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Alkmaar in their own half.
At AFAS Stadion, Tudor Baluta has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Den Haag in their own half.
Dennis Higler signals a Den Haag throw-in in Alkmaar's half.
Throw-in for Den Haag in the half of Alkmaar.
Throw-in for Alkmaar in their own half.
In Alkmaar Den Haag drive forward through Tomas Necid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Alkmaar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Den Haag's half?
Can Alkmaar capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's now 3-0 in Alkmaar as Teun Koopmeiners scores for Alkmaar.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alkmaar make their third substitution with Kenzo Goudmijn replacing Teun Koopmeiners.
Den Haag awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Ferdy Druijf extends Alkmaar's lead to 4-0.
Throw-in for Den Haag at AFAS Stadion.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Alkmaar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Den Haag in their own half.
Goal kick for Den Haag at AFAS Stadion.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Tomas Necid (Den Haag) has received a first yellow card.
